basics.label: An engineer
basics.summary: A Japanese AI researcher, data scientist, and system administrator of AI computing clusters.

work.summary: Engaged in a research of energy efficient reliable ECCs. I also developped Python environment for ECC analysis.
Research and development of state-of-the-art AI technologies. I also working on data mining from big data.

work.position: System administrator of AI computing clusters
work.summary: System management of large AI computing clusters (w/ hundreads of nVidia GPUs).

projects.name: A Fast and highly intepretable Python library for manipulating multivariate Gaussian distributions
projects.summary: Manipulations of Gaussian distributions are sometimes too lazy and troublesome especially when the distributions are multivariate. In this project, developing a Python library that enables calculation of product, quotient, marginal, and conditional distributions of multivariate Gaussian distribution more easily and with higher interpretablity.
